name: Sky Chest
description: Open to gain MVP materials from areas on Juno difficulty and below

name: Sky Guard Helmet
description: helm belong to the Juno guards of highest ranking, its shining golden light will purge all crime.

name: Sky Guard Helmet [1]
description: helm belong to the Juno guards of highest ranking, its shining golden light will purge all crime.

name: Sky Guard Helmet [1] Blueprint
description: helm belong to the Juno guards of highest ranking, its shining golden light will purge all crime.

name: Sky Stone
description: Do not be silly. It is not an animated movie. Trust me, even if you hang 98 of these things around your neck, you will not go to fly like Juno!

name: Slash Axe [1]
description: A heavy axe that specializes in slashing. Some swordsmen also use it occasionally.
effect: HP Regen ＋15,When killing demi-human monsters, Caster has a chance to restore his/her own HP

name: Slash Axe [2]
description: A heavy axe that specializes in slashing. Some swordsmen also use it occasionally.
effect: HP Regen ＋15,When killing demi-human monsters, Caster has a chance to restore his/her own HP

name: Slash [1]
effect: Critical ＋20,[Slash V] ＋[Saint's Cape IV]: Attack Spd ＋5%, Atk ＋5%

name: Slash [2]
effect: Critical ＋20,[Slash V] ＋[Saint's Cape IV]: Attack Spd ＋5%, Atk ＋5%

name: Slaughter Hand Axe [1]
description: An axe with multiple blades. It is unexpectedly light when using.
effect: Dex ＋5,When you use Auto Attacks against Brute monsters, there is a chance to release [Dying Tactic] (invalid to MVP/MINI monsters)

name: Slaughter Hand Axe [2]
description: An axe with multiple blades. It is unexpectedly light when using.
effect: Dex ＋5,When you use Auto Attacks against Brute monsters, there is a chance to release [Dying Tactic] (invalid to MVP/MINI monsters)

name: Slaughter [1]
description: The axe with multiple blades looks so frightening.
effect: Dex ＋5,When Refining ＋5, Dmg to brute race ＋5%

name: Slaughter [2]
description: The axe with multiple blades looks so frightening.
effect: Dex ＋5,When Refining ＋5, Dmg to brute race ＋5%

name: Sleepless Stone
description: Use to become immune to Sleep for 1 min. Cannot work with [Warm Stone] [Whisper Stone] and [Activity Stone].

name: Sleipnir [1]
description: Boots named for Odin's horse, Srebner. They are coveted by all because of the powerful force.

name: Sleipnir [2]
description: Boots named for Odin's horse, Srebner. They are coveted by all because of the powerful force.

name: Slow Atk Alloy
description: After use, Atk ＋100; this effect lasts 30 minutes, unable to coexist with [Rapid Atk Alloy].

name: Small Bottle of Grass Juice
description: The green juice squeezed out of mottlegrass by Geffen Mages, Packed in small bottles. Drinking it increases M.Atk by 5%. The effect lasts 15 minutes, Cannot stack up with other sake, and is not influenced by death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Small Job Potion
description: The potion helps increase a small amount of Job EXP.
